abstract: Google’s proposed $6 billion deal for the social discount site Groupon would complement other local business-focused services, analysts say.  Evelyn M. Rusli examines the possible deal, which stumbled late Friday evening when Groupon brushed it off — at least for now.
snippet: Google’s proposed $6 billion deal for the social discount site Groupon would complement other local business-focused services, analysts say.  Evelyn M. Rusli examines the possible deal, which stumbled late Friday evening when Groupon brushed it of...
lead_paragraph: 8:39 p.m. | Updated Google’s proposed $6 billion deal for the social discount-offer site Groupon would complement other services focused on local business, analysts say. Evelyn M. Rusli of DealBook examines the possible deal, which stumbled late Friday evening when Groupon brushed it off — at least for now.
